nodes.excerpt: I reviewed the Quined Games version that I bought from Zatu Games.

frontmatter.title: Sprawlopolis
frontmatter.description: I highly recommend Sprawlopolis as a highly replayable solo game.

frontmatter.title: Death Valley
frontmatter.description: I recommend Death Valley as a small fun tableau building game.

frontmatter.title: Ragemore
frontmatter.description: Ragemore initially feels good but ultimately lacks depth and variety.

frontmatter.title: SpaceShipped
frontmatter.description: I recommend SpaceShipped as a great multi-use 18 card space merchant adventure.
